posts.post_content:
So I have been toying with this for awhile and thought i would put it out there and see what happens. I have been collecting T206 John McGraw backs, all 4 poses for the last several years. I currently have 42 of the 45 possible backs (PWC AB, PWC Uzit, Glove at hip Uzit being the three I don't have and 2 of those are 1/1) I also have Type II and III Coupon cards for Glove at hip and Portrait with cap Poses and and orange variation of Portrait no cap. I want to try to sell as a group at first. I may break them up, but would like to have them stay together as a run if I can find a new home for them. Here is a link to my Flickr page that shows them 

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/157008903@N05/albums/72157707790911594[/url]

. The four that aren't graded in the scans have been graded by PSA as follows-

Finger in Air old mill PSA 1

Portrait with cap PD 350/460/25- PSA 2

Portrait no cap PD 150 PSA 3

Portrait no cap old mill PSA 2

All cards in folder would be included. 

Asking- $18500 shipped

Please message with any questions. Not breaking up at this time

Entertaining reasonable offers. 
PM with any questions
Thanks
Eric

One more bump then may start dismantling the run
Taking offers

Will entertain offers on individual back runs
Portrait with Cap
Portrait No Cap
Glove at Hip
Finger in Air
Please pm with any questions. Thanks!

posts.post_title: McGraw Portrait with Cap American Beauty PSA 3
posts.post_content: Anyone have an idea of the value of this rarity? Can't find one offered or sold in the past several years

Which 2 are 1 of 1 as I have the Portrait with cap with the American Beauty back?
Rhanks,
Ron
